objects.string:
Kill the monster!
WASD - walk
F - flashlight (uses batteries)

content.text:
Kill the monster!
WASD - walk
F - flashlight (uses batteries)

events.comment:
352 is a number I found by testing numbers until it worked. 347 makes the bottom visible and 357 makes the top visible.
Subtracting 352 to make the camera centered height wise in the room.
uses global MoveSpeed variable, allows us to set it to 0 for cutscenes or something.
Interaction code. makes a "interact" button appear.
